
Here are the Finnish national parks I have visited :)

Coordinates were imported from kartta.com/muut-kartat/suomen-kansallispuistot/.

```{r}
pacman::p_load(tidyverse)
```



```{r}
data <- openxlsx::read.xlsx("data/parks.xlsx") %>%
  tidyr::separate(Coordinates, c('Lat', 'Long'), sep = ", ") %>%
  mutate(Lat = as.numeric(Lat), Long = as.numeric(Long))
```


Awesome icons
https://rstudio.github.io/leaflet/reference/awesomeIcons.html

```{r}
pacman::p_load(sp, leaflet)

# Icon colors
data <- data %>%
  mutate(
    Color = case_when(
      Visit == "Joo" ~ "green",
      TRUE ~ "gray50"
    )
  )

# Icons
icons <- awesomeIcons(
  # icon = 'pin',
  iconColor = data$Color,
  library = 'ion',
  markerColor = data$Color
)

# National park logos
Icons <- icons(
  iconUrl = list.files(path = "logos", full.names = T),
  iconWidth = 30, iconHeight = 30,
  iconAnchorX = 0, iconAnchorY = 0
)

# Plot
data %>%
  leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  addAwesomeMarkers(
    icon = icons,
    label = data$Park_short,
    lng = data$Long, lat = data$Lat,
    options = popupOptions(closeButton = FALSE),
    labelOptions = labelOptions(
      noHide = TRUE, textOnly = TRUE,
      direction = "bottom"
    )
  )


data %>%
  leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  addAwesomeMarkers(
    icon = icons,
    label = data$Park_short,
    lng = data$Long, lat = data$Lat,
    options = popupOptions(closeButton = FALSE),
    labelOptions = labelOptions(
      noHide = TRUE, textOnly = TRUE,
      direction = "bottom"
    )
  ) %>%
  addMarkers(~Long, ~Lat, icon = Icons)

  leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>%

```
